title: Sonnet 60 - the word "Crawls" serves primarily to

content.question: In line 6, the word “Crawls” serves primarily to

choices.label: suggest both the timidity of infants and the feebleness of the aged
allude to the gradual process by which some individuals arrive at greatness
evoke both a baby’s movements and the idea that in youth the years pass slowly
foreshadow the speaker’s long apprenticeship followed by worldly triumph

content.answer: evoke both a baby’s movements and the idea that in youth the years pass slowly

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
